ranked_buckets.name: Geometric Trap (Excessive Lenience)
ranked_buckets.description: Model identifies 'perfect circles' in fonts that are close but not strictly geometric or have minor flares that SSoT rejects.

ranked_buckets.name: Monospace Hallucination
ranked_buckets.description: Model misidentifies proportional fonts as monospaced or fails to recognize genuine monospace fonts due to specimen artifacts.

ranked_buckets.name: Calligraphy vs. Casual Script
ranked_buckets.description: Model confuses casual handwriting/brush scripts with 'traditional calligraphic' forms due to line weight variation.

ranked_buckets.name: Vintage/Era Hallucination
ranked_buckets.description: Model attributes specific historical eras (1920s, 19th century) to modern fonts based on contrast or serifs.

ranked_buckets.name: Texture/Inline Neglect
ranked_buckets.description: Model ignores structural modifiers like 'Inline' or 'Sketch' when they conflict with a structural judgment.
